channel.title: How to change what npcs say!
channel.description:
Ok yall this might be nooby but not many new codes,server makers etc. know how to do this.
OK step one. Go onto your server and find what you wanna replace.
Step 2. Go to npchandler.java and search what you want to replace.
Step 3. MAKE SURE IT IS IN "" "" or ur server will be messed....
Step 4. Replace it and hit save. Compile and Run and if you did correctly it should work CREDITS 100% ME!!
